entry.title: Wednesday: A few rain showers or flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few rain showers or flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries and rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
